Sentencas: In this study, we propose and analyze a new resistor network model designed for the analysis of electrodes with mixed conductivity in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Novel 3-D resistor network simulation method for mixed ionic and electronic conducting electrodes

Sentencas: Resistor networks simulation for electrodes with mixed ionic and electronic conductivity oxides (MIEC) is not typically used due to the presence of oxygen ions and electrons as charge carriers.
Titulo: Novel 3-D resistor network simulation method for mixed ionic and electronic conducting electrodes

Sentencas: To address this complexity within the model, two resistor networks are employed.
Titulo: Novel 3-D resistor network simulation method for mixed ionic and electronic conducting electrodes

Sentencas: These networks conduct the different electrical species, and are linked through a resistor representing the charge transfer (CT) process.
Titulo: Novel 3-D resistor network simulation method for mixed ionic and electronic conducting electrodes

Sentencas: In the case of mixed -conducting electrodes, this CT occurs at the surface exposed to the gas phase.
Titulo: Novel 3-D resistor network simulation method for mixed ionic and electronic conducting electrodes

Sentencas: The electrode simulated in this study is generated using the discrete element method of random sphere insertion, and subsequently voxelized to create the resistor network.
Titulo: Novel 3-D resistor network simulation method for mixed ionic and electronic conducting electrodes

Sentencas: This method considers the geometric and microstructural parameters of the electrode, such as porosity, particle size, and electrode thickness.
Titulo: Novel 3-D resistor network simulation method for mixed ionic and electronic conducting electrodes

Sentencas: Electrical parameters are incorporated into the network through the values of the various conductivities characterizing MIEC oxides and including CT interface conductivities.
Titulo: Novel 3-D resistor network simulation method for mixed ionic and electronic conducting electrodes

Sentencas: By integrating geometric, microstructural, and electrical parameters, the model accurately captures the behavior of the electrodes.
Titulo: Novel 3-D resistor network simulation method for mixed ionic and electronic conducting electrodes

Sentencas: The close agreement between simulation and experimental/theoretical results highlights the efficacy of the approach in elucidating the electrochemical processes occurring at the MIEC electrode.
Titulo: Novel 3-D resistor network simulation method for mixed ionic and electronic conducting electrodes
